input: Imagine a self-contained, hypothetical world with only the following conditions, and without any unmentioned factors or causal relationships: The captain has a direct effect on the private and the corporal. The corporal has a direct effect on prisoner. The private has a direct effect on prisoner. Method 1: We look at how the captain correlates with prisoner case by case according to the private. Method 2: We look directly at how the captain correlates with prisoner in general. To understand how the captain affects prisoner, is it more correct to use the Method 1 than Method 2?
